  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92722</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92722</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mars is visible from earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mars ist von der Masse sichtbar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mars est visible de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marte é visível da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Marte è visibile da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Αρης είναι ορατός από τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Marte es visible de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows why other planets like Mars can be seen from Earth.  Mars reflect sunlight towards the Earth that can be seen during nighttime.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, warum andere Planeten wie 
Mars von der Masse gesehen werden können. Mars reflektiert 
Tageslicht in Richtung zur Masse, die während der Nachtzeit gesehen 
werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre pourquoi d'autres 
planètes comme Mars peuvent être vues de la terre. Mars 
reflètent la lumière du soleil vers la terre qui peut être vue 
pendant la nuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra porque outros planetas 
como Marte podem ser vistos da terra. Marte reflete a luz solar 
para a terra que pode ser vista durante o nighttime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra perchè altri pianeti
come Marte possono essere visti da terra. Marte riflette la luce
solare verso la terra che può essere vista durante la notte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιατί άλλοι πλανήτες 
όπως τον Αρη μπορούν να δουν από τη γη. Ο Αρης 
απεικονίζει το φως του ήλιου προς τη γη που μπορεί να 
δει κατά τη διάρκεια της νύχτας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra porqué otros planetas 
como Marte se pueden ver de la tierra. Marte refleja luz del sol
hacia la tierra que se puede ver durante noche.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Planètes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planetas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλανήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
